ygData.subject: RE: weapons for your pet
ygData.msgSnippet: Your pet can make you rich.  Use it to kill mass amounts of greenies and loot til your hearts content.  Try for high resale and stackable stuff.  If you have
ygData.messageBody:
Your pet can make you rich. Use it to kill mass amounts of greenies and
loot til your hearts content. Try for high resale and stackable stuff. If
you have the faction to walk into RV, then goto the lake and kill tons of
trout and the occaisional Pirhrana. Without a pet I can make 2 plat an hour
easy and all the food you can eat. RV lake is good for 6th. You can even
turn in the pirhrana teeth for xp if you have the faction to talk to Fiddy.
Each trout usually give 2 fish as loot and scales. They sell for almost 2
silver each. Turning in the Pirhrana teeth gives you almost 2 gold each.
I'm sure there are many areas where you can make fast money off loot. If
you pick a good area, you will have trouble looting as fast as you pet kills
stuff.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dark [mailto:dark@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 12:40 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] weapons for your pet


From: "Dark" <dark@...>

Heh at low levels it's not required were talking more like 30+ where fs
weapons are common loot and people have at least 1000pp in the bank. This is
not somethig you have to worry about for awhile.

Naeeldar K'Valle Dark Elf Necromancer of the 43rd Circle

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, October 25, 1999 9:01 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] weapons for your pet


>From: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>
>
>Ok, the consensus seems to be:
>Below 16, give your pet a high-damage weapon
>16-23 (maybe 28) give your pet a low-delay weapon
>24 (maybe 29) and up give your pet two different low-delay weapons
>
>I've seen some pets wandering about with shields - is this ever
>recommended over 2 weapons or a 2H weapon?
>
>More importantly to me, doesn't it get expensive to equip your pet every
>time you summon him? Ok, for those of you over L25, the cost of a few
>dozen FS daggers is irrelevant I suppose. However, I'm seriously sweating
>the 60pp it's going to cost to get my L8 spells (ok, 35 if I ignore the
>less-useful ones, but still...) and giving up a 3gp rusty scythe is worth
>it only because it looks so good. Rusties are valuable loot for me - is
>it really worth the expense to arm my L4 friend?
>--
>Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
